about.description:
Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this sophisticated Brentwood furnished two bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and exquisite living room. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Los Angeles has to offer! (ID #LAX146)

The advertised rate of $2,130/month is the lowest available price, based on a 1 month(s) and 3 day(s) stay with a move-in date of December 9, 2025. If you’re looking for a 1-year stay, the rate is $3,290/month.

Rates vary depending on the duration of stay, season, and other parameters. For exact pricing and additional pricing components, please visit our website and enter your desired move-in and move-out dates. The rate is applicable when billed upfront; it can be higher if billed in multiple payments.
Brokers are welcome to reach out.

Were you looking for an unfurnished lease? Try Blueground instead and upgrade from unfurnished to furnished living:
  - Furnished at rates comparable to unfurnished
  - No setup or furniture costs - save thousands
  - Move-in ready - save time, just bring your suitcase

Designed with you in mind

As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a fully equipped kitchen in this two bedroom property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in the Los Angeles vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart TV. 

Sleeping arrangements

      King Bed, 70.8in/180cm
      King Bed, 70.8in/180cm

Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two bedroom apartment include an on-site:

  - Dryer in building
  - Elevator
  - Swimming pool
  - Washing machine in building
  - Parking
  - Pets allowed

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy!

Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished apartment is located in Brentwood, a small area on the Westside of Los Angeles. It is well-known for being one of the wealthiest in the county. The quiet neighborhood features tree-lined streets and impressive, upscale homes. San Vicente Boulevard is the main thoroughfare and is full of Italian eateries and cozy cafes. In addition, the Getty Center museum is also located in Brentwood and offers a world-class art collection that is ideal for culture lovers.

Other things to note

Building amenities may have an extra cost.
This Blueground apartment has flexible lease options, allowing you to book it for one month, a year, or more.
Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees.
Parking is offered based on availability and is subject to a fee.
We take great pride in ensuring every photo displayed is shot in our own units with our actual furnishings. That said, we regularly refresh our decor and furniture arrangement, which may differ from what’s pictured.

  Also note
      - The floors in this building are on the thin side; some noise from upstairs neighbors may be heard

about.description:
Northridge Apartments near CSUN! 

This apartment community is also within walking distance of a wide variety of shopping, dining, and entertainment attractions. Inside your apartment, you will find a contemporary European kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a chic tile backsplash, large walk-in closets keep your space organized, as smart thermostats ensure comfort no matter the weather. Furnished balconies and patios offer scenic neighborhood views as well. Just past your apartment’s front door, an unparalleled amenity collection enhances your luxury living experience. A deluxe fitness center and two on-site restaurants open to an attractive plaza with plenty of seating options. A spacious dog park allows your furry friends to burn off energy. Other on-site perks include a sparkling resort-style pool, an outdoor spa, and a coin-free laundry room with arcade machine. Perhaps the best feature is our rooftop sun deck and lounge equipped with a full outdoor kitchen, BBQ's, and fire pits, all while featuring expansive views of the San Fernando Valley and the entire Northridge community. about.description:
Tucked away in the hills between downtown Los Angeles and Pasadena, you will experience a comfortable lifestyle at an affordable price with your new home, Huntington Hacienda II Apartment Homes. Your commute is made easy with close access to the 110 Freeway, putting you mere minutes from downtown. Huntington Hacienda II is a lovely, affordable community participating in the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) Low-Income Housing Tax Credit (LIHTC) program. 
Our one, two, three, and four-bedroom affordable apartments in East Los Angeles appeal to the most selective residents. Entertain family and friends in your open-concept kitchen/living area and private patio or balcony. Residents enjoy convenient amenities including controlled gated access, on-site laundry centers, an adventure playground, off-street covered parking and 24-hour maintenance.
Our apartments for rent in East LA are home to many long-term residents who know they can expect a dedicated, responsive staff and maintenance team with decades of experience in the industry. Our professionals are trained to provide the best in service.
Demand the best in value, service, and location. Expect nothing less than Huntington Hacienda II. Your home as it should be.

Please note that the Low Income Housing Tax Credit program is monitored by California Tax Credit Allocation Committee (CTAC), and Huntington Hacienda II applicants must meet the required income criteria in order to qualify for housing. Designed with you in mind

As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a fully equipped kitchen in this two bedroom property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in the Los Angeles vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart TV. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

Arrival and ongoing support

Ideally Located

This furnished apartment is located in Woodland Hills, an upscale neighborhood in Los Angeles’ San Fernando Valley region. A short commute to downtown LA, this area is great spot for nature-lovers and hikers thanks to its location close to the Santa Monica Mountains and numerous green spaces, including Warner Center Park. From high-end steakhouses to international cuisine, Woodland Hills has a dynamic dining scene, with many restaurants boasting gorgeous views as well. It’s a paradise for shoppers too, highlighted by Westfield Topanga & The Village, a gigantic shopping mall frequented by celebrities. While Woodland Hills is walkable and serviced by multiple bus lines, most residents rely on cars to get around.

This furnished apartment is located in Encino, a hip neighborhood in the San Fernando Valley about 25 miles west of downtown Los Angeles. The area's name comes from the Spanish word for oak, which is fitting given the area's natural beauty. Encino is extremely convenient, with several large grocery stores and restaurants at every price point. The neighborhood is home to Los Encinos State Historic Park, the perfect place for a picnic, soccer game, or a look back at California's history at the onsite museum. There's also the Encino Velodrome, an outdoor bicycle racetrack that dates back to the 1960s. Most Encino residents rely on cars to get around, but there is bus service available.

  - Furnished at rates comparable to unfurnished
  - No setup or furniture costs - save thousands

Designed with you in mind

Gorgeous furniture, fully equipped kitchen, smart TV, and a premium wireless speaker are just a few of the amenities you’ll find inside this two bedroom apartment. Ideally located in Los Angeles, you’ll find a lot to love outside as well. When you’re ready to relax, you’ll be happy to discover every Blueground bedroom comes with superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and cozy towels. We handle everything so you can simply show up and start living. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.

  - Basketball Court

  - Pets allowed

Arrival and ongoing support

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy!

Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps.

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Ideally Located

This furnished apartment is located in Woodland Hills, an upscale neighborhood in Los Angeles’ San Fernando Valley region. A short commute to downtown LA, this area is great spot for nature-lovers and hikers thanks to its location close to the Santa Monica Mountains and numerous green spaces, including Warner Center Park. From high-end steakhouses to international cuisine, Woodland Hills has a dynamic dining scene, with many restaurants boasting gorgeous views as well. It’s a paradise for shoppers too, highlighted by Westfield Topanga & The Village, a gigantic shopping mall frequented by celebrities. While Woodland Hills is walkable and serviced by multiple bus lines, most residents rely on cars to get around.

about.description:
Welcome to The Hive on Ellendale, the buzzworthy off-campus housing community designed specifically for students attending USC. Our community is all about finding your hive and we've created an environment that fosters a vibrant and enriching living experience.

At The Hive on Ellendale, we understand that choosing the right place to live is essential. That's why we've perfected the art of student living, ensuring that both students and parents are delighted with their decision. As a longstanding legacy community, we have proudly catered to USC students, offering everything they want and need just steps away from their academic pursuits. Our commitment to providing an upscale and inclusive experience sets us apart from other housing options. All of our units are newly renovated with a modern, upscale design.

Discover our newly renovated two-bedroom, two-bathroom floor plans or our recently constructed five-bedroom apartments. Each option comes fully furnished, complete with an entertainment system, and features an all-inclusive utility fee. Our garden-style apartments span three floors and boast a prime location, just one block away from the nearest grocery store and other community amenities.

Living at The Hive on Ellendale isn't just about having a comfortable and stylish space to call your own; it's about building lasting memories and forging connections. Join your fellow residents for a wide array of community events designed to foster a sense of belonging and camaraderie. After a day of classes, you can easily bike or walk home, explore the renowned Natural History Museum of Los Angeles, cheer on a game at the iconic Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum, or take a short trip downtown on the Metro Line for some retail therapy.

Whether you're seeking a shared living experience or a private oasis, The Hive on Ellendale has you covered. With individual leases based on two people sharing a bedroom, our pricing is student-friendly, with limited private rooms available for those desiring extra space. Embrace the vibrant and fulfilling lifestyle that awaits you at The Hive on Ellendale. Come and be a part of our thriving hive today!

Please Note: The pricing listed is for either a shared room or private bedroom, not the entire unit.
